Utility functions that operate on bundle jars.

getManifest

public static Manifest getManifest(org.apache.twill.filesystem.Location jarLocation)
                            throws IOException
Load the manifest inside the given jar.

Parameters:
jarLocation - Location of the jar file.
Returns:
The manifest inside the jar file or null if no manifest inside the jar file.
Throws:
IOException - if failed to load the manifest.

getEntry

public static com.google.common.io.InputSupplier<InputStream> getEntry(org.apache.twill.filesystem.Location jarLocation,
                                                                       String entryName)
                                                                throws IOException
Returns an InputSupplier for a given entry. This avoids unjar the whole file to just get one entry. However, to get many entries, unjar would be more efficient. Also, the jar file is scanned every time the InputSupplier.getInput() is invoked.

Parameters:
jarLocation - Location of the jar file.
entryName - Name of the entry to fetch
Returns:
An InputSupplier.
Throws:
IOException

unpackProgramJar

                                    File destinationFolder)
                             throws IOException
Throws:
IOException
